sentences.english: It was petty for her not to accept the apology.
sentences.chinese: 她不接受道歉，心胸未免有些狭窄。

sentences.english: The fangs of surface humble, but the dog, full of greed narrow-minded.
sentences.chinese: 表面谦卑恭敬的大牙狗，实则心胸狭窄，充满贪欲。

sentences.english: Nobody liked to make friends with a small-minded man.
sentences.chinese: 没有人喜欢与一个心胸狭窄的人交朋友。

sentences.english: It is the one day in the year when most of us grow big of heart and broad of mind.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是一年中大多数人心胸开阔，气度非凡的一天。

sentences.english: Like I said, he's really big at heart.
sentences.chinese: 正像我说的，他确实心胸开阔。

sentences.english: The intensely critical spirit is often the narrow-minded and ignorant one.
sentences.chinese: 极爱吹毛求疵的人往往是心胸狭窄和无知的人。
心胸狭小的人道人长短。

sentences.english: Phase in our hearts, cold Zhouye of Health.
sentences.chinese: 相在心胸外，凉生肘腋间。

sentences.english: The ocean will make your open-minded, the Lao mountain then lets you realize pure falsely with secluded .
sentences.chinese: 大海会使你的心胸开阔，崂山则让你体会清虚与幽静。

sentences.english: Fourth, Gray wolf have big-hearted sunshine psychology.
sentences.chinese: 第四，灰太狼有心胸开阔的阳光心态。

sentences.english: He is so broad-minded that he never owns anger even when suffering wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他心胸非常豁达，即使他受了委屈，也从来不生气。

sentences.english: And the Lads have ocean-like minds.
Flexibility and open-mindedness in your relationships is called for now.
sentences.chinese: 在各种关系中你要充满弹性，打开心胸。

sentences.english: Your one-track minded thinking will leave you with very little options.
sentences.chinese: 你狭隘的心胸和思想会局限你的选择。

sentences.english: Leaders should be broad-minded enough to tolerate different opinions.
sentences.chinese: 领导者应该心胸开阔，始能容忍不同的主张。

definition: one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded
